posting_body: ['Located in the heart of Santa Clarita, California, you will find a beautifully landscaped apartments for rent at Riverpark Apartment Homes.', 'Our ideal location places you in an area with easy access to major freeways, great dining, and outstanding places to shop, including Westfield Valencia Town Center.', 'Our community is close to the College of the Canyons, Six Flags Magic Mountain, and a variety of recreational options in Los Angeles County.', 'AMENITIES AND FEATURES', '-Cable Ready', '-Entertainment Size Balconies and Patios', '-Expansive Sunbathing Areas', '-Dramatic Cathedral Ceilings', '-Large Walk-In Closets', '-Professional Management Staff', '-Individually Controlled Central Heat and Air', '-Picnic Tables', '-Contemporary California Architecture', '-Spacious', 'One, Two and Three Bedrooms', "-Children's Play Area", '-Space Saving Organizer Systems', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'WEBSITE', '<URL>', 'ADDRESS', '27303 N. Sara St., Canyon Country, CA 91387', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.']
